item.description:
Want to try kayaking ? Join me at Edgewater kayak in Hooksett on the Merrimack river this saturday. We will paddle from there up river to Memorial Field to have lunch, swim and rest. I will take anyone who wants to continue up river with me. Those that want to go back can simply follow the shore back the way we came. ( must have another with you ).

 The rentals are only$5/ hr. There are boats from 10' to 14' and tandems for 2. When you arrive, Please stop and see April to give your name and pay. We estimate 3 hours round trip so she will need $15. If you go back early or stay out longer that will be adjusted on your return but please give her your name and initial payment. If you need a paddle lesson, grap a paddle and come see me. Go choose a boat and put something in it to claim it.

There is no need to call ahead, I will call in a general head count. Please let me know if you will be bringing your own kayak.

So bring your adventurist attitude, bathing suit, lunch, water, sunscreen and water toys squirt guns if you wish. Lets enjoy some time on the water !

Call me if you need more info 603-315-0275

See you there !
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet at the launch

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Kayaking at Edgewater
